name: Benjamin's Bedtime
description:
While babysitting your little brother Benjamin for the night, he decides to play a little game of hide-and-seek before bedtime. But as you chase Benjamin around the house, strange things start occurring around the house and you’re not really sure that it’s your little brother you’re chasing anymore.

This game was created with the Horror Engine and all environmental assets from Unreal Engine marketplace. Monster model and animations from Mixamo: https://www.mixamo.com/#/.
